name: JEN Sandra
goal: Provide legal, policy and strategic advise in relation to the elaboration and implementation of EU environmental law and policy, with a view to improve environmental and health protection.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
* Definition of criteria for the identification of Endocrine Disrupting Chemicals, European Strategy on EDC

* Implementation of EU Nature Legislation

* EU Fisheries Policy
